description: Approval of Details pursuant to condition 34c (land contamination verification report) of planning permission ref: P2014/2131/FUL dated 31/03/2015.
decision_conditions:
For the avoidance of doubt, the following documents were assessed under application reference P2015/3565/AOD (Approval of Details pursuant to Condition 34b (remedial land contamination remediation works) and 38 (a long-term monitoring and maintenance plan in respect of contamination including a timetable of monitoring and submission of reports) of Full Planning application Ref: P2014/2131/FUL):

Listers Supplementary Ground Investigation: 37-47 Wharf Road, Islington, London, N1 7SA, ref. 12.12.023b, December 2014; Listers Supplementary Groundwater Risk Assessment: 37-47 Wharf Road, Islington, London, N1 7SA, ref. 12.12.023d, August 2015; Listers Remediation Method Statement: 37-47 Wharf Road, Islington, London, N1 7SA, ref. 12.12.023c rev-1, August 2015; Letter, ref: AD/mb/12.12.023c, addressed to the Environment Agency from Listers, dated 1 February 2016; Listers Post Remediation Verification: 37-47 Wharf Road, Islington, London, N1 7SA, ref. 12.12.023g - February 2016; Keltbray Remediation Wharf Road Completion Report, ref 6016.CR.LH.030216_Rev 2, 3 February 2016; Letter, ref: AD/cn/12.12.023i, addressed to the Environment Agency from Listers, dated 17 May 2016; Listers Remediation Method Statement - Petrol Plume: 37-47 Wharf Road, Islington, London, N1 7SA, ref. 12.12.023i, March 2016; Listers Petrol Plume (including Exploratory Hole Location Plan): 37-47 Wharf Road, Islington, London, N1 7SA, ref. 12.12.023i, May 2016; Listers Petrol Plume Investigation: 37-47 Wharf Road, Islington, London, N1 7SA, ref. 12.12.023i rev.1, June 2016; Listers Diesel Plume Report: 37-47 Wharf Road, Islington, London, N1 7SA, ref. 12.12.023j, July 2016; Listers Addendum to Petrol Plume Investigation 12.12.023i Rev. 1: 37-47 Wharf Road, Islington, London, N1 7SA, ref. 12.12.023m, August 2016; Listers Addendum to Diesel Plume Report 12.12.023j: 37-47 Wharf Road, Islington, London, N1 7SA, ref. 12.12.023m, August 2016.

.
